edit-page.AlternateEdit: This hook gets called at the beginning of &action=edit, before any user permissions are checked or any edit checking is performed.
edit-page.AlternateEditPreview: This hook gets called at the beginning of &action=edit, before any user permissions are checked or any edit checking is performed.
edit-page.EditFormPreloadText: Called when edit page for new article is shown.
edit-page.EditPage::attemptSave: Called before an article is saved, that is at the beginning of internalAttemptSave() is called.
edit-page.EditPage::showEditForm:fields: This hook is called before edit box and the toolbar are published.
edit-page.EditPage::showEditForm:initial: Called just before the preview and edit form are rendered
edit-page.EditPage::showStandardInputs:options: Allows injection of form fields into the editOptions area
edit-page.EditPageBeforeConflictDiff: Allows modifying the EditPage object and output when there's an edit conflict.
edit-page.EditPageBeforeEditButtons: Used to modify the edit buttons on the edit form
edit-page.EditPageBeforeEditChecks: Allows modifying the edit checks below the textarea in the edit form

page-rendering.AfterBuildFeedLinks: Use this hook to remove feed links from the head of the output.
page-rendering.ArticlePageDataBefore: Executes before data is loaded for the article requested
page-rendering.ArticleViewHeader: Occurs when an articleheader is shown
page-rendering.PageRenderingHash: Alter the parser cache option hash key
page-rendering.GalleryGetModes: Allows extensions to add classes that can render different modes of a gallery.
